Add Notice You can add notice for student,staff.by clicking the button shown below.
Add News/Events You can add News/Events for student,staff.by clicking the button shown below.
Sort Homework List You can sort homework list according to date wise or subject wise.by clicking the button shown below.
Add / Sort Homework You can add homework. Also you can sort homework list according to date wise or standard, division, subject wise.by clicking the button shown below.
Absent Student List You can mark absent student to present manually.
Own Attendance Details You can check attendance details by clicking on particular date.
Absent Student and StaffList You can mark absent student as well as staff to present manually.
Manage Account You can manage your account by clicking on setting button,From here you can add / remove multiple child.also you can change your mobile no.
